title: The Anti-War Vote That Came 20 Years Late
description:
The real congressional battle over Iraq happened in 2007, when Barack Obama and Joe Biden caved to George W. Bush.

The post The Anti-War Vote That Came 20 Years Late appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Forensic Re-creations of Police Abuse Lead to Landmark Legal Settlements
description:
Expert reconstructions that tie together evidence provide a public record of abuse that’s harder for cops to deny.

The post Forensic Re-creations of Police Abuse Lead to Landmark Legal Settlements appeared first on The Intercept.
